title: System Logged an Informational Event
description: Captures non-critical Nutanix system events to provide insights into cluster activity, changes, and health trends.

definition.name: LogicInsight - Nutanix Cluster Info Alarms
definition.message:
{{#is_alert}}

Informational Event from Nutanix Cluster `{{ntnx_cluster_name}}`

This is a non-critical system event reported by Nutanix.  
It does not require immediate action, but it provides valuable insights about system activities, recommended actions, or recent tasks.

Purpose:  

These informational events help monitor the health, activity, and behavior of your infrastructure.  
Use them to:

1. Track task executions and system changes.
2. Detect configuration drifts or recommended optimizations.
3. Improve visibility into cluster-level operations.

No further action is required unless these events become recurrent or are tied to performance degradation.

{{/is_alert}}
